name: Bleater: A Game About Doomscrolling
description:
This game is currently a work in progress and is in the playtesting stage. By playing the game in it's current state, you are agreeing to allow us to capture data about your gameplay for the sole purpose of making the game better.

Bleater is a cynical parody of social media, which asks players to question whether or not the posts they read are conducive to a healthy lifestyle. How long you can last before the doom and gloom starts to get to you?

A game by Corben Gilbert, Gabe St. Onge, Alex MacDonald, and Kyle Ahn.
